comments.title: Comments

comments.placeholder: What do you think this clipping? You can write down and communicate with others.

help.title: What is the `My Clippings.txt`
help.content:
connect kindle to the computer by usb, and find a folder named as `documents`,
double click and enter into the folder,
then find the file `My Clippings.txt`
video and images should be here

private.on: Clippings you upload will be public(can be seen by others)
private.off: Clippings you upload will be private(only you can see)

danger.removeAccountTip1:
Deleting the account will erase all data and cannot be recovered. Please make sure you really want to delete it. 
If you have any dissatisfaction, you can send an email to annatar.he+ck@gmail.com to try to solve it. 
To really confirm the deletion of your account, please click the confirmation button below. Your account will be permanently deleted within 24 hours
danger.removeAccountDoneTip: Do not login again in 24 hours, and your account will be delete permently
